attributes.action: All Cardiff Taxi Drivers, Black&White and Private Hire. Uber Cross Border?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

In any case, licensing of private hire vehicles in Wales is the responsible of the Welsh Government, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
